channel.title: Blogs on Vladimir Alekseev
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Vladimir Alekseev

item.title: What's next?
item.description: End of university Finally it ended, I changed university 3 times :) Studied one semester in Innopolis University - it was very free, but useless time. After that I back to Kazan Federal University, where started studying. Can’t say that it was better, but I could work fulltime :) I remember only as my faculty took 2nd place on mini-footbal championat, it was all of a sudden, we were outsiders of the group.
